entry.title: Long Sleeve Hemp Tencel T-shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 69.00

Wicking moisture and staying fresh, these hemp sweaters work great as travel gear, or  outdoor sports.

Made from our mid-weight hemp/tencel knit, this comfortable layer regulates body temperature while letting your skin breathe. This long sleeve hemp sweater includes contrast stitching for an incognito superhero style. 

Dress it up or dress it down. Either way, you'll be reaching for this sweater whenever there's a slight chill or when you want to give your arms some cover.  

  • Long sleeves with contrast stitching
  • Fit and wear exceedingly well
  • Wicks moisture, Letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Sustainably Made
  • Midweight Jersey Knit
  • 60% Hemp 40% Tencel

    We design everything in Santa Monica, California, and make all our hemp clothing ethically, with family-owned contractors in Los Angeles, USA.

    • Shipping
    • Returns
    • Garment
      • All U.S. orders $200 or more receive FREE USPS priority shipping.
      • Vital Hemp accepts Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.
      • All markdown styles are final sale. No refunds or exchanges.
      • Customers returning items for credit or exchange are responsible for return shipping costs ($8.00). 
      • All US orders are typically shipped within 48 business hours (excluding weekends).  USPS Priority domestic mail often delivers packages within 2-3 business days from the date of mailing.
      • International orders ship within 5 to 7 business days and may take up to 14 business days to deliver depending on the shipping service.
      • Unworn, unwashed garments, with tags,  may be exchanged or returned for store credit if returned within  21 days with a receipt.
      • Items must be returned in the same condition in which you received them, any signs of wear will not be accepted for return. 
      • Defective merchandise will receive a full refund. To expedite processing, please include a note with return address and requested action (ex: please exchange for the same item in a smaller size; or please issue me a gift card for store credit).
      • Exchanges for any items eligible for return will be based on availability of the stock.
      • We do not accept returns of gift cards, masks, promotional items and final sale items.
      • Vital Hemp is not responsible for a lost or stolen packages once it has been delivered.
      • Hemp is the most durable natural fiber. These hemp clothes will last you a long time if you take care of them. As many in the hemp industry say about hemp: “You don’t wear it out; you wear it in.” Our garments are garment-dyed, they have already been shrunk to the max. The will not shrink any more; though the fabric may relax a bit over time.
      • Suggestions for care: In general, you don’t need to baby hemp. Machine wash cold or warm. Tumble dry warm, or line dry (best not to dry in high heat). Avoid bleach, velcro and any hardware that can snag. Avoid uneven exposure to the sun as the sunlight may fade the color.
      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.
      • Hempjucation: The first jeans were made from hemp; but they lasted too long; so the business switched to cotton. Cotton uses 25% of all pesticides, polluting ecosystems. Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.

entry.title: 100% Hemp Men's Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 138.00

The 100% Hemp Linen Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt.

This classic, hemp long sleeve button-down shirt is made with a strong, lightweight 100% hemp linen, that lets your skin breathe, and resists wrinkles, due to the loose weave.

Double pockets add style to this hemp work shirt, that can be worn over a hemp tee, or on its own, buttoned-up, with sleeves extended or rolled. Pair with our Anywhere Pants to feel like a millionaire beach bum.

  • Double Pockets
  • Coconut Buttons
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Open weave resists wrinkles
  • 100% Hemp Linen
  • American-made thread

entry.title: 100% Hemp Men's Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 96.00

The 100% Hemp Linen Short Sleeve Button-Down Shirt.

This classic hemp button-down short sleeve shirt is made with a strong, lightweight 100% hemp linen, that lets your skin breathe, and resists wrinkles, due to the loose weave.

Double pockets add style to this hemp work shirt, that can be worn over a hemp tee, or on its own, buttoned up as much or as little as you wish. Perfect for walking up a sunny beach, or down a hot road to town. While others shvitz, you stay dry.  Thanks hemp.

entry.title: Men's V-Neck Hemp T-shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 44.00

Hemp V-neck t-shirt.  Not too deep, not too shallow.

Our Vital Hemp v-neck t-shirt works great when it’s hot, and as a base layer for yoga, biking, hiking or any other aerobic sport. We receive a lot of compliments from our customers who appreciate the fit and feeling. A friend loves his V so much, I'm thinking of calling this style "The Martin."

  • Fits and wears exceedingly well
  • Fabric and garment made in LA.

entry.title: Men’s Hemp Long Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 69.00

Getting chilly?  Reach for this cozy layer.

Made from our mid-weight hemp/organic cotton knit, this comfortable layer regulates body temperature while letting your skin breathe. We spend a lot of time making sure our items fit and wear well for years. Wicking moisture and staying fresh, these hemp long sleeves work great as travel gear, or as a second layer for biking, hiking or any other outdoor sport. They're especially nice for a morning stretch,  after a chilly surf, or at home relaxing.

entry.summary:

Favorite pants to throw on for Anywhere, Anytime

We've perfected the fit and feel of our 100% hemp Anywhere Pants over the course of a decade, and they feel amazing! One customer reported, "They make me feel like a billionaire beach bum."

From the morning yoga class, where the rise is long enough to allow for any pose, to the grass where they're tough enough to roll around, to a night out with anyone, you're covered in durable, lightweight, breathable style.

entry.title: Men's Vital Hemp Deep Roots Printed T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 44.00

"A classic hemp tee from 2018, commemorating Hemp History Week, the largest nationwide grassroots public education, advocacy, and marketing effort to raise awareness about the diverse uses of hemp. With a mission to educate the general public about the unparalleled environmental, entrepreneurial and economic impacts of hemp, HHW renewed strong support for the farming, processing and production of hemp in the United States." 

—Hemp Industries Association

We constructed our hemp t-shirt in a durable hemp/organic cotton blend. This hemp knit works well as a base layer, regulating body temperature during any kind of activity. It’s a stylish go-to tee that commemorates a special moment in our history with the plant, connecting us to the deep roots of our shared history. 

  • Made and printed in Los Angeles
  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Lightweight Jersey Knit

entry.title: Men's Vital Hemp T-shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 44.00

Your Favorite T-shirt will be this Hemp Tee.

We employed the body-tested fit of our men's short sleeve hemp t-shirt, and constructed it in a more durable hemp/organic cotton blend that has a soft drape and a smooth finish.

The shirt fits the same, but hangs at a standard length, just below the belt line. This hemp knit works well as a base layer, regulating body temperature during any kind of activity. It’s a go-to, versatile, healthy t-shirt that feels good on you every day

      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.

Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.

entry.title: Men's Vital Hemp Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vital Hemp
Type: mens
Price: 69.00

Our hemp hoodies got you covered in understated style. 

We spend a lot of time making sure our hemp hoodies fit and wear outstandingly well for years. This hemp hoodie is made from a hemp/organic cotton knit.

Wicking moisture and letting your skin breathe, these hoodies work great as travel gear, or over a short sleeve for a wide range of temperatures. Our customers love it as a second layer for wearing around town, because it keeps you snuggly without getting hot. Or wear it for more aerobic activity -- hiking, biking, you name it. 

 

  • Fit and wear exceedingly well
  • Wicks moisture, letting your skin breathe
  • Machine Wash, Tumble Dry
  • Sustainably Made
  • Midweight Jersey Knit 
  • 55% Hemp / 45% Organic Cotton

    We design everything in Santa Monica, California, and make all our hemp clothing ethically, with family-owned contractors in Los Angeles, USA.

    • Shipping
    • Returns
    • Garment
      • All U.S. orders $200 or more receive FREE USPS priority shipping.
      • Vital Hemp accepts Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.
      • All markdown styles are final sale. No refunds or exchanges.
      • Customers returning items for credit or exchange are responsible for return shipping costs ($8.00). 
      • All US orders are typically shipped within 48 business hours (excluding weekends).  USPS Priority domestic mail often delivers packages within 2-3 business days from the date of mailing.
      • International orders ship within 5 to 7 business days and may take up to 14 business days to deliver depending on the shipping service.
      • Unworn, unwashed garments, with tags,  may be exchanged or returned for store credit if returned within  21 days with a receipt.
      • Items must be returned in the same condition in which you received them, any signs of wear will not be accepted for return. 
      • Defective merchandise will receive a full refund. To expedite processing, please include a note with return address and requested action (ex: please exchange for the same item in a smaller size; or please issue me a gift card for store credit).
      • Exchanges for any items eligible for return will be based on availability of the stock.
      • We do not accept returns of gift cards, masks, promotional items and final sale items.
      • Vital Hemp is not responsible for a lost or stolen packages once it has been delivered.
      • Hemp is the most durable natural fiber. These hemp clothes will last you a long time if you take care of them. As many in the hemp industry say about hemp: “You don’t wear it out; you wear it in.” Our garments are garment-dyed, they have already been shrunk to the max. The will not shrink any more; though the fabric may relax a bit over time.
      • Suggestions for care: In general, you don’t need to baby hemp. Machine wash cold or warm. Tumble dry warm, or line dry (best not to dry in high heat). Avoid bleach, velcro and any hardware that can snag. Avoid uneven exposure to the sun as the sunlight may fade the color.
      • Ironing: Our knits don’t generally need to be ironed. If you want to iron our 100% hemp wovens to make them look brand new again, use a hot iron on the linen setting and use steam.
      • Hempjucation: The first jeans were made from hemp; but they lasted too long; so the business switched to cotton. Cotton uses 25% of all pesticides, polluting ecosystems. Hemp doesn’t need pesticides. The original linen was made from hemp. Hemp wicks better than all other plant fibers, letting your skin breath. Hemp is anti-microbial, so clothes stay fresher longer.
